description_narrative:
The objective of the Programme is to support the implementation of the UNCCD (UN Convention to Combat Desertification) in West Asia and North Africa specifically its 10-Year Strategic Plan with focus on improving the living conditions of affected populatio
ns (Strategic Objective 1) improving the conditions of affected ecosystems (Strategic Objective 2) and mobilizing partners and resources for drylands development (Strategic Objective 4). Its Purpose is to mobilize partners and resources to improve the livi
ng conditions of local populations and the management of natural resources in areas affected by desertification and drought in six Programme countries namely Morocco Tunisia Algeria Lebanon Jordan and possibly Syria. This will be achieved through the provi
sion of policy advice technical support and catalytic funding towards: a) Mainstreaming dryland development issues into policy and planning frameworks, b) Enhancing livelihoods and building resilience of dryland communities, c) Improving the management of 
natural resources, d) Promoting gender equity and empowerment of dryland women, and e) Facilitation of knowledge sharing and South-South cooperation.
